name: Habitica Smaller Header
description: Shrink the header and give it a more pleasing background color (black)
additional_info:
Shrink the header a bit, move up the Filter and Create buttons, and give it a black background.  Hides the Battle Monsters with Friends header section as well.

I use this along with https://userstyles.org/styles/148850/shrink-your-habitica-tasks-font-and-buttons-edt and https://userstyles.org/styles/148842/unscroll-habitica-task-list.
